prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Drums, Guitar, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Piano, Drums, and Guitar, but no Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Piano, Drums, and Guitar, omitting Chromatic Percussion.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Piano, Drums, and Guitar, excluding Chromatic Percussion.
